trans-unit.source: Represents an attribute that is applied to the class definition and determines the <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType*>s of the properties that are of type <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个特性，应用于类定义，并确定<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType*>的类型的属性<xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType*>

trans-unit.source: Control authors apply this attribute to the class definition to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>s of the properties that are of type <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: 控件作者将此特性应用于类定义以指定<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>属于类型<xref:System.Windows.Style>.</xref:System.Windows.Style>的属性</xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you look at the declaration of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> class, this attribute is used to specify that the <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你看一下的声明<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>类，此属性用于指定<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>属性是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Subclasses inherit this definition but can redefine the <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of the property by using this attribute on its own class definition.
trans-unit.target: 子类继承此定义，但可以重新定义<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>通过其自己的类定义中使用此属性的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this class or its properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法不能使用此类或其属性在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.StyleTypedPropertyAttribute"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the name of the property that is of type <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的类型的属性名称<xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用情况你不能使用此属性在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that is of type <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType*> of the <xref:System.Windows.StyleTypedPropertyAttribute.Property*> this attribute is specifying.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<> *1> 的<> *1> 指定此属性。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用情况你不能使用此属性在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType*> of the <xref:System.Windows.StyleTypedPropertyAttribute.Property*> this attribute is specifying.
